Computer.name: d3odex project server
Computer.file: Airblock - tool that turns off internet on a specific machine and dump network on a specific machine in background in fact airblock - rootkit that masks as normal daemon,it installs a controller and dumper controller - it is a lightweight server that can be controlled by a client,client can send off command to controller and internet turns off,also client can reboot machine,check status,browse filesystem,and more ... dumper - daemon that dumps all network traffic and sends to client pc through ssh in encrypted format,client decrypting that dump with unique key generated on setup of this utility

GitCommitEntry.Message: Improved communication between client controller and dumper
